page.title: 03Ogston Reservoir - nature
page.content: {Fishing} A fishing licence is needed before you can fish the well-stocked waters of the reservoir.This may be purchased from the 'New Napoleon' which is the public house overlooking the reservoir. A day licence is quite costly at approximately Â£12. There are good stocks of trout in the waters. { { Birdwatching The reservoir is extremely popular with keen birdwatchers, as this scenic, sheltered area attracts many species of bird, both common and rare. There are hides along the water's edge so the birds can be watched without being alarmed. Birds seen include coot, great crested grebe, heron and kingfisher.
